posts.post_content:
For sale is a very nice example of Abstein with the more difficult AB 350 w/Frame back.  This card is guaranteed to grade.  The condition is VG-VG/EX with a small crease near the upper left corner, and a couple of surface wrinkles near the bottom right shoulder.  Looking for $150 *SOLD* delivered.  Paypal FF preferred.  If interested, please send a PM or email me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks, Tom

Ugh

If deal doesn't materialize I will take it. 

Best
Scott
